HELLO_MESSAGE:
Hello, %s!

👋 I am a bot for finding recipes

❗ What you can do:
✅ Find recipes from the database by keyword or ingredient. To do this, send a message to the bot
✅ Find a random recipe
✅ Find recipes by category

My recipe database already contains the coolest recipes
Good luck!

Use the keyboard or write what you want to find👇
HELP_MESSAGE: 👋 I am a bot for finding recipes ❗ What you can do: ✅ Find recipes from the database based on a keyword or an ingredient. Send a message to the bot ✅ Find a random recipe ✅ Find recipes by categories In my recipe database, there are the coolest recipes Good luck! Make use of the keyboard or write what you want to find👇
EXCEPTION_ILLEGAL_MESSAGE: No, I wasn't trained for that! Send a text, photo or video
EXCEPTION_UPDATE_HANDLE_MESSAGE: Something went wrong. Please contact the programmer
INSERT_KEYWORD_MESSAGE: Send a keyword or ingredient to search for recipes
INSERT_RECIPE_MESSAGE:
Send a recipe in the format:
Recipe Name

• ingredient
• ingredient
• ingredient

Instructions for preparation

#hashtag #hashtag #hashtag
RECIPE_PARSING_ERROR: Failed to parse the recipe. Check if the recipe matches the template
RECIPE_ALREADY_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A recipe with that name already exists. Add another one
RECIPE_UPDATING_FORMAT_ERROR: Incorrect format: do not delete the service line /edit_recipe///...///
INSERT_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE: Send a notification text or write /cancel to cancel
SEND_ME_PHOTO_MESSAGE: Send a photo or write delete to delete it
SEND_ME_VIDEO_MESSAGE: Send a video or write delete to delete it
USER_WAS_UNSET_ADMIN_MESSAGE: User %s is no longer an admin
SEND_MORE_RECIPES_QUESTION_MESSAGE:
Continue showing recipes? 
(or send a new request)
SEND_MORE_USERS_QUESTION_MESSAGE:
Continue showing users? 
(or send a new request)
DELETE_RECIPE_QUESTION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the recipe %s?
WAITING_FOR_EDITED_RECIPE_MESSAGE: Delete bot name and send edited recipe 👇
